Texts.Chs: 试着制作一些基本的物品，比如用处很多的^orange;物质萃取器^reset;。^orange;加工台^reset;以及它的^green;升级产品^reset;是制作其他FU工作台所必需的。好好利用它。
Texts.Eng: Try building a few more basic goods such as the extremely useful ^orange;Extraction Lab^reset;. The ^orange;Machining Table^reset; and its ^green;upgrades^reset; are necessary for every FU crafting station. Use it well.

Texts.Chs: 你已经迈出了通往^cyan;Frackin'Universe^reset;的第一步。有了^orange;加工台^reset;，你可以制作出巨量的^orange;实验设备，器材^reset;以及^green;所需资源^reset;。先来制作个^orange;电磁铁^reset;看看。
Texts.Eng: You've taken your first steps in ^cyan;Frackin' Universe^reset;. With the ^orange;Machining Table^reset; you can now branch out into a wide assortment of ^green;Lab Stations and Equipment^reset; as well as ^green;crafting resources^reset;. Let's start by making an ^orange;Electromagnet^reset;.
